sense.def:
A breed of animal
je določena vrsta živali; terier je na primer
a breed of dog
.

seg.quote: Different breeds of sheep give wool of varying lengths.

sense.def:
To breed animals or plants
pomeni nadzorovano rediti živali ali gojiti rastline, da bi zraslo več živali ali rastlin z določenimi lastnostmi.

seg.quote: Strains of the plant have been bred that resist more diseases.
We retain a small proportion of bulls for breeding purposes.

sense.def:
Kadar živali
breed
, se parijo in imajo mladiče.

seg.quote: The breeding season is a very long one.

sense.def:
Človek, ki je
born and bred in a particular place
, je bil v tistem kraju rojen in je tam preživel večji del otroštva.

A particular breed of person
je tip človeka s posebnimi lastnostmi ali znanji.

seg.quote: This required a whole new breed of actors.
